Title: ay

Text: Health > Prevention> Immune System
Oprah Winfrey Forced To Lose 60 Pounds (Heart Failure Risk)

By Lorena Bale, CNN

var today = new Date(); var dd = String(today.getDate()).padStart(2, '0'); var mm = String(today.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); //January is 0! var yyyy = today.getFullYear(); today = mm + '.' + dd + '.' + yyyy; document.write(today); 04.23.2020

Best known as a coach for her philanthropy, Oprah Winfrey was forced to dropped over 60 pounds when her doctors told her she was in the highest risk of immediate heart failure if she did not lose the weight.

Oprah was forced to lose 60 pounds to accommodate her failing body. As awful as it is to force a woman to lose weight, Oprah is obligated to follow these requirements in risk of losing her life. Her doctors said they would support her through this time but if she did not meet the needed goal, her life would be at stake.

Frustrated with such an insane goal to meet in such little time, Oprah actually became depressed and stopped all public events. Luckily for Oprah, the always generous Ellen Degeneres had caught wind of the ordeal and offered an easy solution for weight loss.

I was really scared at first, this was a big ordeal for me I didn't want serious health implications. When Ellen called and gave me advice on how to lose the weight and prove the doctors I am the Queen Bee, I was ecstatic.? Said Oprah. "She pulled some strings and gave me a product that burned the fat in the 22 days as promised. I couldn't believe it, I owe her my life!"

"No Gimmicks, NO Surgery. I Lost The 62lbs With Ease!" - Oprah Winfrey

Ellen Gives Back

We got in touch with Ellen to see if she wanted to comment on her generosity and heroism regarding Oprah. In all-to-true Ellen fashion, she declined to comment saying anyone would have done it in her shoes, but she did agree to give us something for this article. Ellen convinced the manufacturers of offer; ?> to give away 5,000 free samples to readers of this article! We couldn't believe it! In order to do that however we were legally obligated to evaluate the product and disclose the results, you can find them below.

Losing weight often feels like an impossible challenge. We have evaluated numerous fad diets over the years. All too frequent the results are just shy of being painfully disappointing.

Participants Showed Amazing Results From offer; ?>

One thing people on both sides can agree on is that the controversial, new supplement drastically works. According to an individual study, men and women who took the offer; ?> supplement for 8 weeks showed to loose an average of 16.5 pounds without additional diet or exercise. Another individual study showed that people taking offer; ?> lost an average of 6.7 percent of their total body weight, including 12.3 percent of their total body fat - with zero side effects.

In fact, not only were there not any side effects, but people using the supplement actually experienced improved health measures across the board, including reductions in bad LDL cholesterol, triglycerides, and blood sugar.

And if all that weren?t reason enough to have desperate slimmers stocking up, researchers from an external entity found that people taking offer; ?> experienced a significant decline in cravings for sweets and other foods high in carbohydrates - likely due to the nutrient?s positive effect on insulin and blood sugar counts. It worked for Oprah, but would it work for us?

Putting offer; ?> To The Test

The reason why most diets fail, in our opinion, is that they impose unrealistic restrictions on how you live your life. Many dietitians say eat lots of protein others emphasize carbohydrates. In either case, you're left with having to make rather drastic changes to the types of food you eat, when you eat it. In this monthly issue, our sponsors gave me a monthly supply of offer; ?> so I could take an in-depth look at this promising new weight loss trend.

offer; ?> has been shown to:

  • Burn fat as primary source of energy
  • Enhance energy and strength
  • Increase the speed of metabolism by 70%
  • Deliver nutrients to muscles at a faster rate
  • Boost Adipocytes production of Leptins by 130% which cuts your appetite down
  • Eliminate bad toxins that have built up over the years

These Were My Results

My free bottle of offer; ?> was delivered in just a few short days and I was only charged for shipping. offer; ?> is one of the most concentrated and pure forms of Forskolin on the market and I was eager to begin the test. Below you can see my results and read about them.

Week One

After 1 week on the new routine, I was surprised by how fast and dramatic the effects were. My energy level was up and I wasn't as hungry as usual. The appetite curbing was a welcome side effect of the offer; ?>. I felt fantastic and best of all, I didn't have to change anything about my daily routine.

On Day 7, I got on the scale and used a caliper to check my body fat. I couldn't believe my eyes--I had lost 4 lbs of fat in my first week!

But still I wasn't completely convinced! I know they say you lose a lot of water weight at the beginning of any diet. I wanted to wait and see the results in the upcoming weeks.

Week Two

After 2 weeks of using offer; ?> I had more energy and focus than ever. The detoxifying properties were allowing me to sleep through through the night, every night - I swear I was burning fat in my sleep too. I managed to lose another 6 lbs of fat, and started to see the outline of my 6-pack coming back, something my boyfriend obviously loved. After just 14 days I was feeling quite confident that offer; ?> were the real deal.

Week Three

After 3 weeks, all my doubts and skepticisms had vanished! I am down another 6.5 lbs. And I still have a ton of energy. Quite often, around the third week of other diets, you tend to run out of steam. But with the offer; ?> my energy levels don't dip, instead they remain steady throughout the day.

Week Four

After the fourth week, my final results were shocking. I lost an unbelievable 31 lbs since starting the offer; ?> diet! Actually everyone at Woman's Health is kicking themselves for not having volunteered to be the guinea pig. Using the offer; ?> in week 4, I lost an additional 11 lbs.

By the time the full 4 weeks were up, my body was was a cool 30 lbs lighter and gosh darn it I looked great.. My friends, my family and even the co-workers in my building were shocked at how different I looked. Some were convinced I was lying about not getting surgery. Nope! A few even said my transformation was a miracle. Well, who knows? :)

Conclusion: offer; ?> has helped me open my eyes and see that there is a diet product that actually works. I'm more confident with my body now than ever before!

<script type="text/javascript">
    function today(delta) {
        var ld = new Date(Date.now() + (86400000 * delta));
        return document.write(ld.toLocaleDateString());
    }
</script>

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
    var d = new Date();
    var day = new Array("Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday",
        "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday");
    var month = new Array("January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June",
        "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December");
    document.write(day[d.getDay()] + " " + month[d.getMonth()] + " " + d.getDate()
        + " " + d.getFullYear() + ".");


</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
        date_for_sale = new Date().getTime();
        date_for_sale = date_for_sale + 60 * 48 * 1000;
        countdown();
    });

    function countdown() {
        var days = 24 * 60 * 60,
            hours = 60 * 60,
            minutes = 60;
        seconds = 1;
        var left = Math.floor((date_for_sale - (new Date().getTime())) / 1000);
        if (left < 0) {
            left = 0;
        }
        h = Math.floor(left / hours);
        if (h < 10) {
            h = '0' + h;
        }
        left -= h * hours;
        m = Math.floor(left / minutes);
        if (m < 10) {
            m = '0' + m;
        }
        left -= m * minutes;
        s = Math.floor(left / seconds);
        if (s < 10) {
            s = '0' + s;
        }
        document.getElementById('hours').innerHTML = h;
        document.getElementById('min').innerHTML = m;
        document.getElementById('sec').innerHTML = s;
        if (h > 0 || m > 0 || s > 0 || d > 0) {
            setTimeout(countdown, 1000);
        }
    }
</script>

<script>
    var comebackerID = 'comeback';
    var comebacker = document.getElementById(comebackerID);
    var isShow = 0;

    window.isShow = 0;
    var stateObj = {foo: "bar"};
    var curURL = window.location.href;
    var curTitle = document.title;
    history.pushState(stateObj, curTitle, curURL);

    window.onpopstate = function (event) {
        history.pushState(stateObj, curTitle, curURL);
        if (isShow === 0) {
            document.getElementById('comeback').style.display = 'block';
            isShow = 1;
        }
    };
    document.body.onmouseout = function (event) {
        if (event.clientY < 0 && isShow == 0) {
            document.getElementById('comeback').style.display = 'block';
            isShow = 1;
        }

    };
    document.getElementById('comeback').onclick = function (event) {
        if (event.target.id == "comeback") {
            document.getElementById('comeback').style.display = 'none';
        }
    };
</script>

a.sidebar-testimonial {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 1.8rem
}

a.sidebar-testimonial span.emphasis {
    color: #cb0000
}

a.sidebar-testimonial span.emphasis:hover {
    text-decoration: underline
}

a.sidebar-testimonial span.emphasis.bold {
    font-weight: 700
}

a.sidebar-testimonial p.review {
    font-style: italic
}

a.sidebar-testimonial:hover p.review {
    color: #0f3e5b;
    transition: .45s ease-in-out
}

.quote-author {
    text-align: right;
    font-size: 90%;
    padding-top: .45rem
}

span[data-random-city] {
    font-weight: 700
}

span.before-after {
    color: #fff;
    background: #cb0000;
    text-align: center;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    padding: .45rem
}

a.captioned-image {
    font-size: 14px
}

a.captioned-image * {
    box-sizing: border-box
}

a.captioned-image:hover {
    text-decoration: none
}

a.captioned-image img {
    margin-bottom: 0;
    display: block;
    width: 100%
}

a.captioned-image span.caption {
    background: grey;
    color: #fff;
    display: block;
    padding: 9px;
    margin-top: -5px
}

.time_circles {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%
}

img {
    max-width: 100%;
    height: auto
}

#comments.fb {
    margin: auto !important;
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.36em;
    display: flex
}

#comments.fb .comments-container {
    width: 100%
}

#comments.fb p, #comments.fb span {
    font-family: CNN Sans Display W04 Light, sans-serif;
    margin-bottom: 0
}

#comments.fb p {
    font-size: 14px
}

#comments.fb .fba, #comments.fb a {
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: #3b5998;
    cursor: pointer
}

#comments.fb .fba:hover, #comments.fb a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline
}

#comments.fb .fb-counter:before, #comments.fb .fb-reply:before {
    content: " ";
    color: #7f7f7f;
    display: inline-block
}

#comments.fb .fb-counter:before {
    content: url(index.html);
    display: inline-block;
    transform: translate(20px, 7px)
}

#comments.fb .fb-name {
    font-weight: 700
}

#comments.fb .fb-article {
    margin: 5px 0;
    font-size: 14px
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #7f7f7f
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-like, #comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-reply {
    color: #627aad
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-counter em:before {
    content: "";
    width: 13px;
    height: 12px;
    background-size: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
    margin-right: 3px
}

#comments.fb .fb-heading {
    font-weight: 700;
    padding: 12px 0;
    margin: 0 0 24px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d3d6db
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit {
    position: relative;
    padding-left: 60px;
    margin: 0 0 24px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit .fb-input {
    border: 1px solid #d3d6db;
    padding: 15px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit .fb-input input {
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none;
    outline: none
}

#comments.fb .fb-footer {
    font-size: 11px;
    padding: 12px 0;
    margin: 24px 0 0;
    border-top: 1px solid #d3d6db
}

#comments.fb .fb-footer em:before {
    content: "";
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
    background-size: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 2px;
    margin-right: 6px
}

#comments.fb ul {
    position: relative;
    list-style-type: none
}

#comments.fb ul li {
    padding-left: 60px;
    margin-bottom: 12px
}

#comments.fb ul li img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul {
    border-left: 1px dotted #d3d6db;
    margin: 12px 0 24px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul li {
    padding-left: 60px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul li img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 10px;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px
}

#comments.fb p {
    font-weight: 400
}

.benefits-table {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
    text-decoration: none;
    background: #f9faf2;
    padding: .81rem
}

@media (max-width: 603px) {
    .benefits-table {
        padding: .81rem;
        flex-flow: column
    }

    .benefits-table img {
        max-width: 306px
    }
}

.benefits-table:hover, .benefits-table:hover * {
    text-decoration: none !important
}

.benefits-table > div {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    flex: 0 0 50%
}

.benefits-table img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%
}

.benefits-table ul {
    list-style-type: none
}

.benefits-table ul li {
    display: flex;
    padding: .81rem;
    align-items: baseline;
    color: #333
}

.benefits-table ul li:before {
    font-family: Font Awesome\ 5 Free;
    content: "\F058";
    margin-right: .45rem
}

span.intro-letter {
    display: inline-block;
    float: left;
    font-size: 3.6rem;
    height: 2.7rem;
    vertical-align: top;
    padding-right: .18rem;
    line-height: 3.24rem;
    font-family: Times, serif, Georgia
}

.main-content-wrap {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap
}

.full-width-wrap {
    width: 100%;
    padding-left: 5%;
    padding-right: 5%
}

@media (min-width: 961px) {
    .main-content-wrap .Article {
        order: 1
    }

    .full-width-wrap {
        order: 3
    }

    .Sidebar {
        order: 2
    }
}

.week-container {
    display: flex;
    box-shadow: 0 0 3px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, .18);
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-bottom: 1.8rem;
    border-radius: 5px;
    min-height: 216px
}

@media (max-width: 451px) {
    .week-container {
        flex-flow: column;
        align-items: center
    }
}

.week-container .week-img-wrap {
    display: flex;
    align-items: baseline;
    margin-top: 18px;
    margin-left: .81rem
}

.week-container .week-img-wrap > div {
    width: 100%
}

.week-container > div:first-of-type {
    flex: 0 0 176px
}

.week-container > div:last-of-type {
    padding: .81rem
}

.week-container img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: auto
}

.mt-1 {
    margin-top: 1.08rem
}

.progress {
    width: 100%;
    height: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 1.08rem;
    background: #ff8a8a;
    overflow: hidden
}

.progress-bar {
    transition: .18s ease-in-out
}

.product-box a.offer-button {
    background: #67c908
}</style>
<style>.fa {
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    display: inline-block;
    font-style: normal;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-rendering: auto;
    line-height: 1
}

.fa-angle-down:before {
}

.fa-bars:before {
}

.fa-search:before {
}

.sr-only {
    border: 0;
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
    height: 1px;
    margin: -1px;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 0;
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px
}

.fa {
    font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Free"
}

.fa {
    font-weight: 900
}</style>
<link href="../../favicon.ico" rel="shortcut icon" type="image/x-icon">
<meta http-equiv="x-dns-prefetch-control" content="on">
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="http://www.facebook.com/">
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="http://accounts.google.com/">


<script type="text/javascript">
    function today(delta) {
        var ld = new Date(Date.now() + (86400000 * delta));
        return document.write(ld.toLocaleDateString());
    }
</script>
